text: Tara balale -- ''he salih‌! Tumi to amadera kache era age chile asa-bharasara patra, tumi ki amadera pitrpurusara yadera upasana karata tadera upasana karate amadera nisedha karacha? Ara amara to abasya'i sandehera madhye rayechi se-sanbandhe yara prati tumi amadera ahbana karacha -- bibhrantikara!’’
